title: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great
excerpt: Begin your fitness journey todayâ€”greatness comes from consistency, not perfection.
content: The hardest part of any fitness journey is starting. We wait until we're 'ready,' until we have the perfect plan, perfect equipment, perfect circumstances. But perfection is procrastination in disguise. Greatness begins with imperfect action.
author: admin
